source_objects.title: 3D & Animation
source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: Create awesome volumetric spheres in blender
items.headline: Wanna create awesome effects for any cool sci fi, fantasy, abstract scene, then this is the course for you.
objectives_summary: - You will get a better understanding of the shading node system
- You will be able to create and animate awesome volumetric sphere in Blender.
- You will be able to animate values and render you scenes

items.title: Animated Engine model design in fusion 360

visible_instructors.title: Hardik Dharaiya
visible_instructors.job_title: Mechanical Engineer with experience in computer aided design
visible_instructors.name: Hardik

items.headline: This course covers designing of parts, assembly of parts and model animation in fusion 360.
objectives_summary: Fusion 360
computer aided design
CAD

items.title: Getting Started with TinkerCAD
items.headline: Learn 3D modeling, 3D printing, design, and more with TinkerCAD
objectives_summary: 3D modeling
Create object to set sizes
Prepare 3D models for 3D printing

items.title: Introduction to Human IK In Maya for 3d Animation

visible_instructors.title: 3dmotive LLC
visible_instructors.job_title: High Quality 3d and Game Art Training by Industry Pros!
visible_instructors.name: 3dmotive

items.headline: Learn to setup and properly retarget animations with IK inside of Autodesk's Maya for use in games and film!
objectives_summary: Create and Identify Skeleton Definitions and Characterization
Learn to use the Control Rig Properly
Properly Retarget Animations

items.title: Procedural Materials In Blender
items.headline: As Part of The Blender Creative Suite, Learn How To Get Started With Procedural Materials
objectives_summary: How to navigate the shader editor .
Useful shortcuts to speed up your workflow.
How texture coordinates and values are processed in shaders.

items.title: Fusion 360 for CNC - A CAM masterclass

visible_instructors.title: Mathieu Dorion
visible_instructors.job_title: Mechanical engineer by trade, maker of stuff by choice
visible_instructors.name: Mathieu

items.headline: Learn to create toolpaths for a CNC using Fusion 360
objectives_summary: Create different toolpaths in Fusion 360 for a CNC
Navigate the controls of the manufacturing section of Fusion 360
Understand the order of operation necessary in CAM

items.title: PowerPoint Intro Machine - Create Logo Intros in PowerPoint

visible_instructors.title: Claudiu Titus Georgescu
visible_instructors.job_title: Pasionate web video producer and video marketing enthusiast
visible_instructors.name: Claudiu Titus

items.headline: Create animated logo intros for videos in PowerPoint, quickly and easily
objectives_summary: Create simple intros by using just the preset transitions in PowerPoint
Create more complex intros by using combined animations
Learn how, when and where to use precise timings for the animations and transitions

items.title: Maya Training - Creating/Modelling "The Brooklyn Bridge"
items.headline: Learn all aspects of 3D modelling with this comprehensive Maya course for Intermediates to Advanced Level Users
objectives_summary: Users will have a better insite into modelling in 3D
Students will be able to create detailed models inside Maya
Students will have a better understanding of high poly modelling as well as considerations for low poly

items.title: Substance Painter - Digital Gift
items.headline: Learn 3D texturing techiques to create your own custom digital gift
objectives_summary: Create basic material selections using fill layers and masking techniques
Create an alpha patterns to make a custom gift wrap
Color a 3D asset using generated textures to give it more vibrant colors

items.title: Make an amazing retro title in After Effects
items.headline: Be able to take your game, movie or trailer titles to a new level.
objectives_summary: You will be able to take your first basic steps into "Frame by frame" animation.
Learn some great tips on how to take your design in After Effects to the next level.

items.title: Hard Surface 3d Vehicle Detailing and Texturing for Games

visible_instructors.title: 3dmotive LLC
visible_instructors.job_title: High Quality 3d and Game Art Training by Industry Pros!
visible_instructors.name: 3dmotive

items.headline: Learn the process of unwrapping, sculpting, polypainting, and rendering his Hard Surface Sci-Fi Vehicle Tank!
objectives_summary: Learn the unwrapping process for this hard surface vehicle
Learn the texturing and detailing workflow using Maya, ZBrush, and Photoshop

items.title: Create Your Own Instagram Filter with Spark AR
items.headline: Learn to create your own Instagram/Facebook AR Filter using SPARK AR!
objectives_summary: Learn how to create your own AR Filters
Build engaging and fun AR filters for you or your brand
Step out of the masses with personalized filters for your audience

items.title: Blender Materials and Texture Series - Volume one
items.headline: Learn the basics of applying materials in the blender interface
objectives_summary: Create new materials
Use Blenders material interface to create and arrange material slots
Learn how to prevent losing materials when you exit blender

items.title: World Machine: Texturing with images for realism
items.headline: Add realism to your terrain textures with images in World Machine
objectives_summary: You will learn how to add pure realism (from real images) to your terrain textures with unparalleled control over how you distribute them.

items.headline: Learn the concepts and fundamentals of creating appealing chacaters from real life references and photographs
objectives_summary: zBrush

Character Sculpting

items.title: Create seamless textures for 3D VISUALIZATION
items.headline: you'll Be able to create almost any seamless texture from photograph and take Your 3D Renders to the NEXT LEVEL
objectives_summary: Be able to create almost any seamless texture from photograph
Capable of creating seamless beautiful  textures  with  smart , easy , fast way
Taking Your 3D Renders to the Next Level (hight level )
